contentList.content: After making a melee attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to the damage it deals.
You are naturally resistant to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].
Sparks of electrical energy dance along the length of the blade.
Sparks of electrical energy crash along the length of the blade.
When the wielder deals damage using this weapon, they inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag> upon the target(s).
